item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Documind – Open-source AI tool to turn documents into structured data (43 points | 11 comments)
2. Show HN: Nova JavaScript Engine (105 points | 33 comments)
3. Reactive HTML Notebooks (81 points | 6 comments)
4. Phonetic Matching (7 points | discuss)
5. Fortran II Hypersource (10 points | discuss)
6. GaussianAnything: Interactive Point Cloud Latent Diffusion for 3D Generation (21 points | 1 comment)
7. Reverse Engineering iOS 18 Inactivity Reboot (387 points | 110 comments)
8. Museum of Bad Art – art too bad to be ignored (4 points | 2 comments)
9. LLaVA-O1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step (9 points | discuss)
10. AlphaProof's Greatest Hits (209 points | 111 comments)
11. We are shutting down Ondsel (228 points | 84 comments)
12. You could have designed state of the art positional encoding (145 points | 25 comments)
13. Mapping the Ionosphere with Phones (67 points | 7 comments)
14. Google Gemini tells grad student to 'please die' while helping with his homework (25 points | 12 comments)
15. Garak, LLM Vulnerability Scanner (184 points | 57 comments)
16. Solar-powered desalination system requires no extra batteries (44 points | 3 comments)
17. ChibiHash: Small, Fast 64 bit hash function (50 points | 14 comments)
18. An alternative construction of Shannon entropy (90 points | 8 comments)
19. Show HN: A dynamic C (Hot reloading) module-based Web Framework (104 points | 40 comments)
20. Show HN: The App I Built to Help Manage My Diabetes, Powered by GPT-4o-Mini (132 points | 55 comments)
21. Nokolexbor: Drop-in replacement for Nokogiri. 5.2x faster at parsing HTML (59 points | 4 comments)
22. Constraints in Go (195 points | 75 comments)
23. ML in Go with a Python Sidecar (98 points | 13 comments)
24. It's Time to Replace TCP in the Datacenter (2023) (127 points | 78 comments)
25. How Japanese black companies oppress workers (2014) (149 points | 180 comments)
26. Show HN: Zyme – An Evolvable Programming Language (137 points | 16 comments)
27. Why did Windows 95 setup use three operating systems? (252 points | 132 comments)
28. Show HN: Dumbo – Hono inspired framework for PHP (3 points | 1 comment)
29. Memos – An open source Rewinds / Recall (111 points | 31 comments)
30. YC is wrong about LLMs for chip design (288 points | 238 comments)
